title: Incorrect ray sensor behavior when attached to fixed joint with rotation

content.raw:
This bug is related to and possibly a duplicate of issue #543 and issue #509.

Using a ray sensor attached to another link through a fixed joint produces weird behavior when the rotation of the fixed joint is non-zero.

This behavior includes seeing through walls in some places as well as the sensor data being rendered incorrectly when visualized in Gazebo.

When published to RVIZ, the sensor data is not weirdly translated.

I only saw the "through the wall" behavior using a world generated from the willow_walls_heightmap included in the simulator_gazebo package.
